listitem.para: Number of bugs shown in each box. The default is 10.
Default page to transfer to after Login or Set Project. The default is 'my_view_page.php'. An alternative would be 'view_all_bugs_page.php' or 'main_page.php'.
Determine how the links in timeline is displayed. When set to OFF, it will display as issue id. When set to ON, it will display as issue id and summary. Default OFF.
